thread.title: Oscars 2018: Cast Your Ballot

author: Joe Morgenstern
title: Oscars 2018: Cast Your Ballot
text:
Wall Street Journal film critic Joe Morgenstern weighs in on who deserves to win the top awards at the 90th Academy Awards—and who will actually win. See his choices for key contests (marked with red and purple icons), and have your own say in our annual poll.
Best Picture Will win and should win: “The Shape of Water”
So much praise... RELATED VIDEO Film Clip: 'The Shape of Water' Watch a clip from ‘The Shape of Water,’ starring Sally Hawkins. To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
